General.Name: RN2 Technologies Co. Ltd
General.Description: RN2 Technologies Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures multilayered electric circuits with LTCC, HTCC, AlN, and ferrite material. Its products include LTCC powder; 90° hybrid, directional, asymmetric, and broadband couplers; Doherty combiners; terminations; delay lines; dividers; chip antennas; attenuators; quadrifilars; and LTCC/HTCC/HIC substrates foundry services. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.
